coreAttributes.name: arcane recurve bow
coreAttributes.description: This bow's limbs curve away from the archer when unstrung, allowing it to store and deliver more energy than an equivalent straight-limbed bow. When drawn, an arcane bolt is formed from the archer's stored essences, which acts as the arrow.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot at [npc.name] with your recurve bow.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Drawing back [npc.her] arcane recurve bow and firing an ethereal arrow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(hit)] [npc2.name] right in the chest, causing [npc2.herHim] to gasp and stagger back from the blow.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] arcane recurve bow to fire an ethereal arrow at [npc2.name], and [npc.verb(manage)] to [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane recurve bow and [npc.verb(let)] loose, sending an ethereal arrow to cut through the air and hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] arcane recurve bow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc2.name]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] arcane recurve bow to fire an ethereal arrow at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane recurve bow and [npc.verb(let)] loose, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
